meanings.definition: A person from the same country as another.
meanings.sent1: My compatriot and I both grew up in the same town.
meanings.sent2: As a compatriot, I feel a strong bond with my fellow citizens.
meanings.sent3: When my compatriot tried to speak a foreign language, it sounded like gibberish!
meanings.sent4: In times of need, a compatriot is like a beacon of hope in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The image of my compatriot waving the national flag is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: Every compatriot has the right to vote in our country.
meanings.sent2: We all work together as compatriots to build a better community.
meanings.sent3: My compatriot always tells the funniest jokes at our neighborhood gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The unity among compatriots is the foundation of a strong nation.
meanings.sent5: As a compatriot, I stand proudly with my fellow citizens in times of celebration.
